Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! I heard you're building a Tea Cup ride, so I
came by to lend a hand.
<PAGE>
So what's a "tea cup ride?" Really big cups that
you spin around and ride in? This must be one'a
them foreign blueprints.
<PAGE>
When did cups stop being just fer drinkin' out
of? Ah well. I get how it's put together, now.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's get to work! I'll give you some
pointers as we go, so do like I tell you, 'kay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, looks like it's all done. So, how do you
actually operate this thing?
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll be headin' on home, then.

The Tea Cup ride is complete! I should put it
somewhere.
